author: Lisa Rathke
title: Virus sours business for already-reeling dairy industry - Associated Press
description: MARSHFIELD, Vt. (AP) — This was supposed to be rebound year for dairy farmers embattled by at least four years of depressed milk prices — and then the coronavirus hit. Schools, restaurants,...
content:
MARSHFIELD, Vt. (AP) This was supposed to be rebound year for dairy farmers embattled by at least four years of depressed milk prices and then the coronavirus hit.
Schools, restaurants, institutions and universities closed to help slow the spread of the viru… [+4240 chars]
